messages.title: We all face a choice about the future of our National Health Service.
A better plan. A better future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour's plan to recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more doctors.

issues.health: Our NHS is too important to leave in the Tories' hands. We're backing Labour's plan to recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more doctors.

images.caption: An elderly couple looking at each other with a sense of warmth and concern about the NHS.
